Class Smugglers

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.Smugglers
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Smugglers extends AdventureCard
Represents a Smugglers adventure card.

This card introduces an encounter with space smugglers. Players must decide whether to confront the smugglers using firepower or suffer penalties such as losing days of travel and valuable materials.

If the smugglers are not defeated, the player loses a fixed number of days and materials.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Smugglers

      public Smugglers(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, int firePower, int lostMaterials, ArrayList<Material> materials) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new Smugglers card.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the card.
      type - the type/level of the card (e.g. AdventureCard.Type.LEVEL2).
      lostDays - the number of days lost if the player does not defeat the smugglers.
      firePower - the firepower threshold required to defeat the smugglers.
      lostMaterials - the number of materials to be lost if the smugglers are not defeated.
      materials - the list of materials at stake in this encounter.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid (e.g., negative values or null materials).

      public boolean isDefeated()
      Returns:
